Name: Serenitide
Notes: Moon where cyborg survivors settled, beneath rains of planet Pluvia

Name: Pluvia
Notes: Planet with gentle skies that rain down on moon Serenitide

Name: Quiyah
Notes: Star casting golden flame, providing light to Serenitide

Name: Aster
Notes: Primary cosmic goddess, honored in temples built by Serenitide inhabitants

Name: Andromeda
Notes: Companion goddess, honored alongside Aster in temples on Serenitide
